sentences: Meie uue kodu asukoha valimine v√µttis aega.
context: The word 'asukohta' is the illative case singular form of the Estonian noun 'asukoht', meaning location or place. It indicates movement to or into a location, similar to saying 'to a location' in English. This grammatical case shows directionality - where something is being moved to or placed.
